markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rat-Catcher Trident](/Equipment.aspx?ID=573)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)
</row>

**Access** follower of  Hanspur 

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The haft of this _+2 striking [trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)_ is carved with intricate designs of swarming rodents sacred to [Hanspur](/Deities.aspx?ID=154), the drowned god of the Sellen River. When used against a [swarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=239), it ignores the swarm’s resistance to piercing damage, if any.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** While floating down a river on a raft or boat, you plunge the _rat-catcher trident_ into the water. The trident casts a 5th-level [_control water_](/Spells.aspx?ID=51) spell on the body of water.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Rat-Catcher Trident
